Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins

Annotation Interface PluginValue

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({PARAMETER,FIELD}) @NameProvider(PluginValueNameProvider.class) @QualifierType @Deprecated(since="3.0", forRemoval=true) public @interface PluginValue
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
Exists for compatibility with Log4j 2 2.x plugins. Not used for Log4j 2 3.x plugins.
Identifies a parameter as a value. These correspond with property values generally, but are meant as values to be used as a placeholder value somewhere.
